title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 182.32 - Soliciting passengers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 182.32 - Soliciting passengers

State Regulations

The soliciting of passengers for any vehicle within the
parkway system is prohibited. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
182.32

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
